captions: In the image, a group of students is gathered outside a school, with some of them sitting on a bench and others standing nearby. One of the students, a young boy, is sitting on the bench and looking at the camera with a sense of dread, as if he is dreading the day ahead. Another boy is sitting next to him, possibly trying to cheer him up or offer support. The other students in the scene seem to be going about their day, some carrying backpacks and handbags. The overall atmosphere appears to be one of anticipation and reluctance to start the day at school.
